plugin.name: CustomSkip3
plugin.title: Custom Skip 3
plugin.desc: PLEASE READ: Custom Skip 3 uses a different name now. Please *uninstall* any *previous* version of Custom Skip *3* BEFORE installing this version. And you can delete this repository url from LMS > settings > plugins afterwards because the new version will be part of the main LMS plugin repository soon. Sorry for the inconvenience.
plugin.creator: AF
